body:
#### PR description:

Backport of #41464 to CMSSW version 13_1_X which contains a bug fix for ZDC simulation geometry

#### PR validation:

Use the runTheMatrix test workflows

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Backport of #41464
title: Run3-gex160Y Backport of #41464 to CMSSW version 13_1_X which contains a bug fix for ZDC simulation geometry
